title: 3 Profitable Amazon KDP Keywords Low Competition High Demand #kdp  #kdpkeywords  #makemoneyonline

tactics.name: Minimalistic Logbook Design
tactics.description: Create logbooks with straightforward, minimalistic covers to attract construction workers seeking direct solutions.
steps: Use tools like Creative Fabrica to design covers
Incorporate interior page layouts into cover designs
Ensure large size (8.5x11) for detailed record-keeping
caveats: Avoid sponsored listings in top positions
source_quotes: this one has a bestseller rank of 431 276

tactics.name: Keyword Niche Validation
tactics.description: Verify keyword profitability using analytics tools and platform data
steps: Check Amazon Scout Pro and self-publishing Titans analytics
Validate BSR, price, and review data
caveats: Avoid trademarked names to prevent account bans
source_quotes: this data needs to be considered and taken into consideration

tactics.name: BSR & Review Analysis
tactics.description: Evaluate keywords using bestseller rank and review counts to identify low-competition, high-demand niches.
steps: Check BSR and review counts for target keywords
Modify templates from Creative Fabrica/Etsy with commercial licenses
caveats: Avoid niches with BSR over 1 million
source_quotes: the previous keyword which is Greek mythology coloring book to be an ideal keyword

heuristics.name: Low-Competition Niche Targeting
heuristics.condition: If total_results < 1000 and BSR < 400000, then prioritize niche
source_quotes: ideally we would aim for anything that is a total results of 1000 or less

heuristics.name: Low Competition Boost
heuristics.condition: If median reviews are below 200 and BSR exceeds 50,000, prioritize keyword
source_quotes: this keyword has a bestseller rank of 328,961

heuristics.name: Low Review Boost
heuristics.condition: If median reviews are less than 200, prioritize the keyword
source_quotes: total results are under 1688 so personally I would consider the previous keyword

claims.statement: Amazon Scout Pro identifies niches with keyword scores 35-7 for profitability
source_quotes: the bottom corner as you can see that Circle in the yellow this is by the keyword Niche score given by Amazon Scout Pro

claims.statement: Keywords with BSR over 1 million and low review counts indicate high competition and low demand.

niche_patterns.example: construction workers + daily task tracking + minimalistic design
niche_patterns.description: Target specific professional identities with practical problem-solving constraints
niche_patterns.why_it_works: Balances niche specificity with functional utility for busy industries
